Register user
-----------------

    $ curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"username\":\"username\", \"password\":\"123456\"}" -X POST http://localhost:3000/register

**Returns the JWT:**

    {"jwt":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..gJ-q4l_kguMlDU1vi-KYTZYZ1KSYpbitVzeCB9yWvd4"}

Login
--------

    $ curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"username\":\"username\", \"password\":\"123456\"}" -X POST http://localhost:3000/login

Test REST API with **passport-jwt** middleware
---------
Copy the JWT from the previous requests and make a call to **/jwt_test_route**

     $ curl -H "Authorization: JWT eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..gJ-q4l_kguMlDU1vi-KYTZYZ1KSYpbitVzeCB9yWvd4" http://localhost:3000/jwt_test_route
